user.name: Emilio Jesús Gallego Arias
user.bio: “La perfection est atteinte, non pas lorsqu'il n'y a plus rien à ajouter, mais lorsqu'il n'y a plus rien à retirer.”

commit.title: [declare] Allow obligations hook to manipulate state
commit.message:
[declare] Allow obligations hook to manipulate state

Equations makes pervasive use of obligation creation in hooks; we
would ideally like to reify this chaining API into a DSL, but that's
not doable in the short term. Instead, we extend the type of the hook.

Note that this will also arrive to regular hooks at some point, if we
are going to move the `Declare` API away from `Global.*` use.
